title: Smart Data models - DMROFunction schema
description: Defines the YANG mapping of the DMROFunction Information Object Class (IOC) that is part of the NR Network Resource Model (NRM).

dmroControl.description: Property. This attribute determines whether the MRO function is enabled or disabled.. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

maximumDeviationHoTrigger.description: Property. This parameter defines the maximum allowed absolute deviation of the Handover Trigger, from the default point of operation.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

minimumTimeBetweenHoTriggerChange.description: Property. This parameter defines the minimum allowed time interval between two Handover Trigger change performed by MRO. This is used to control the stability and convergence of the algorithm.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

tstoreUEcntxt.description: Property. The timer used for detection of too early HO, too late HO and HO to wrong cell.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'
